title: Tell us why you don’t have a Mandatory Reconsideration Notice
subtitle: You can still appeal if you have asked [DWP] for ‘mandatory reconsideration’ but haven’t got the MRN letter.
haveNotContactedDWP: I haven’t contacted DWP about their decision

error.required: Please tell us why you don’t have a MRN

reasonForNoMRN.question: The reason you don't have an MRN
